sentences: Meil oli kokkulepe kohtumisel kell kolm.
Kokkulepe on lõpetatud ja kõik pooled on nõus.
context: The Estonian word 'kokkulepe' refers to an agreement, arrangement, or understanding between parties. It can be used in various contexts such as business deals, meeting arrangements, or any situation where there is mutual consent or a pact made between people.
